price: Nanso Wͻn a wͻyi boniayε no wͻ ahomasoͻ ne kotia paa mu.
arabic: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فِي عِزَّةٖ وَشِقَاقٖ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: bali alladhīna kafarū fī ʿizzatin washiqāqin
